function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Imprecision of outdoor environmental measurements in relation to indoor transmission of influenza","Impact":"Misjudgment of environmental conditions leading to ineffective mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Use of indoor environmental measurements to complement outdoor data","Technologies":"Indoor environmental monitoring systems","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Researchers, public health officials"},{"Description":"Uncertainty around the effect of temperature on virus stability and survival","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of virus behavior in different environmental conditions","Mitigation":"Conducting controlled experiments to study the effect of temperature on virus stability","Technologies":"Lab-controlled temperature chambers","People":"Virologists, environmental researchers","Owner":"Virology labs, research institutions"},{"Description":"Risk of incomplete evaporation of respiratory droplets in the environment","Impact":"Potential for prolonged airborne survival of virus-carrying droplets","Mitigation":"Investigation and control of factors influencing droplet evaporation","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, droplet evaporation simulation models","People":"Public health officials, aerosol researchers","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"}]}
